verses.t: For{G1063} every{G3956} high priest{G749} taken{G2983} from among{G1537} men{G444} is ordained{G2525} for{G5228} men{G444} in{G2525} things{G3588} pertaining to{G4314} God{G3588}, that{G2443} he may offer{G4374} both{G5037} gifts{G1435} and{G2532} sacrifices{G2378} for{G5228} sins{G266}:

Who can{G1410} have compassion on{G3356} the ignorant{G50}, and{G2532} on{G3356} them that are out of the way{G4105}; for that{G1893} he{G4029} himself{G846} also{G2532} is compassed with{G4029} infirmity{G769}.
And{G2532} by reason{G1223}here{G3778}of{G1223} he ought{G3784}, as{G2531} for{G4012} the people{G3588}, so{G3779} also{G2532} for{G4012} himself{G1438}, to offer{G4374} for{G5228} sins{G266}.
And{G2532} no{G3756} man{G5100} taketh{G2983} this honour{G3588} unto himself{G1438}, but{G235} he that is called{G2564} of{G5259} God{G3588}, as{G2509} was Aaron{G2}.

So{G3779} also{G2532} Christ{G3588} glorified{G1392} not{G3756} himself{G1438} to be made{G1096} an high priest{G749}; but{G235} he that said{G2980} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Thou{G4771} art{G1488} my{G3450} Son{G5207}, to day{G4594} have{G1080} I{G1473} begotten{G1080} thee{G4571}.
As{G2531} he saith{G3004} also{G2532} in{G1722} another{G2087} place, Thou{G4771} art a priest{G2409} for{G1519} ever{G3588} after{G2596} the order{G3588} of Melchisedec{G3198}.

Who{G3739} in{G1722} the days{G3588} of{G3588} his{G846} flesh{G4561}, when he had offered up{G4374} prayers{G1162} and{G2532} supplications{G2428} with{G3326} strong{G2478} crying{G2906} and{G2532} tears{G1144} unto{G4314} him that was able{G1410} to save{G4982} him{G846} from{G1537} death{G2288}, and{G2532} was heard{G1522} in{G575} that he feared{G3588};
Though{G2539} he were{G5607} a Son{G5207}, yet{G2539} learned he{G3129} obedience{G3588} by{G575} the things which{G3739} he suffered{G3958};
And{G2532} being made perfect{G5048}, he became{G1096} the author{G159} of{G4991} eternal{G166} salvation{G4991} unto all{G3956} them that obey{G5219} him{G846};
Called{G4316} of{G5259} God{G3588} an high priest{G749} after{G2596} the order{G3588} of Melchisedec{G3198}.
Of{G4012} whom{G3739} we have{G2254} many{G4183} things{G3588} to say{G3004}, and{G2532} hard to be uttered{G1421}, seeing{G1893} ye are{G1096} dull{G3576} of hearing{G3588}.

For{G1063} when{G2532} for{G1223} the time{G3588} ye ought{G3784} to be{G1511} teachers{G1320}, ye have{G2192} need{G5532} that one{G5101} teach{G1321} you{G5209} again{G3825} which{G5101} be the{G3588} first{G3588} principles{G4747} of the oracles{G3588} of God{G3588}; and{G2532} are become{G1096} such as have{G2192} need{G5532} of milk{G1051}, and{G2532} not{G3756} of{G5160} strong{G4731} meat{G5160}.
For{G1063} every one{G3956} that useth{G3348} milk{G1051} is unskilful{G552} in the word{G3056} of righteousness{G1343}: for{G1063} he is{G2076} a babe{G3516}.

But{G1161} strong{G4731} meat{G5160} belongeth{G2076} to them that are of full age{G5046}, even those who{G2192} by reason of{G1223} use{G3588} have{G2192} their senses{G3588} exercised{G1128} to{G4314} discern{G1253} both{G5037} good{G2570} and{G2532} evil{G2556}.
